title: Unified Command Plan Change
summary: The document titled "2025-10323.pdf" is a memorandum from the President, dated May 23, 2025, approving the implementation of the revised 2022 Unified Command Plan as requested by the Secretary of Defense on April 22, 2025. The memorandum instructs the Secretary of Defense to notify Congress and authorizes the publication of the memorandum in the Federal Register. This action reflects the President's authority as Commander in Chief and aligns with relevant U.S. Code provisions. The key implication is the formalization of military command structure adjustments, which may impact national defense strategy and operations.
